post_content:
Looking for a centered, crease free, example with clear registration. Much prefer a PSA holder for this card for idiosyncratic collector reasons. If you have one available please PM or respond here. 

I’ve been on tilt since shuffling my feet and missing out on Luke’s beauty from last week. 

Help!
Thanks.
I have this one, but it is SGC. Otherwise it ticks all the boxes. I am asking $2k PPGS due to the high eye appeal. I can’t get the picture to upload but the cert is 2834429

I bought the one you originally referred to - the Old Mill PSA 2 that Luke had listed here. Contact me and maybe we can work something out to where you can buy it from me and I can obtain another to take its place.
